name: Pretend You're Xyzzy - Bigger Blacker Theme
description: An Eye friendly black and grey-gradient theme for the Cards Against Humanity clone "Pretend You're Xyzzy." Selected cards, winning cards, and winning users will be highlighted in a medium red. Please check the Notes section for instructions! This will not work without editing the script!
additional_info: You will need to edit this document to use the correct address. Firefox: 1. Open your Add-ons and select the User Styles tab. 2. Find the Bigger Blacker Theme and click Edit. 3. Find the second line in the script. It should say "@-moz-document domain("insertwebsitehere.com")" 4. Change "insertwebsitehere.com" to "pyx-1.pretendyoure.xyz" 5. Save! Done! Profit! Chrome: 1. Open your Stylish App's options from the Extensions page. 2. Find the Bigger Blacker Theme and click Edit. 3. Locate the "Applies to" section below the code window. It should say "google.com" 4. Ensure that "URLs on the domain" is selected from the drop down box. 5. Change "insertwebsitehere.com" to "pyx-1.pretendyoure.xyz" 6. Save! Done! Profit! This will likely need to be done again if you notice the theme stops working/if it gets updated. 9/19/15: Added notation comments in case someone would like to make their own theme.
